pl:en-US:Innowacyjne rozwiązania na styk: Innovative solutions at the intersection of science, medicine and biotechnology
pl:en-US:Pracownia Unikalnych Modeli Apl: The Unique Application Models Laboratory (P.U.M.A.) operates at the interface of basic science, translational research and implementation innovation. We create and develop unique biological and bioengineering models to reliably reflect processes in living organisms and in clinical and industrial environments.
pl:en-US:Badania fundamentalne w zakresi: Fundamental research in microbiology, bioengineering and molecular medicine.
pl:en-US:Przekładanie odkryć naukowych n: Translating scientific discoveries into practical clinical and therapeutic solutions.
pl:en-US:Komercjalizacja wyników badań i: Commercialization of research results and implementation of new technologies in industry.
pl:en-US:In vitro, ex vivo i in vivo, w: In vitro, ex vivo and in vivo, including using Galleria mellonella larvae
pl:en-US:Testowanie biomateriałów - opat: Testing of biomaterials - dressings, drug carriers
pl:en-US:Badania translacyjne nad skutec: Translational research on the efficacy of antiseptics, antibiotics, dressings, and naturally derived compounds evaluated using the above models
pl:en-US:Analiza skuteczności i bezpiecz: Preclinical efficacy and safety analysis using alternative models to mammalian studies
pl:en-US:Wykorzystujemy algorytmy AI do: We use AI algorithms to analyze the movement patterns of Galleria mellonella larvae as a response to toxic substances, including psychoactive substances, and to evaluate the efficacy of anti-infective drugs and drug safety in general
pl:en-US:P.U.M.A. to zespół naukowców, k: P.U.M.A. is a team of scientists who work efficiently, quickly and flexibly - like the catfish from which we took our name.
pl:en-US:Jeśli w Twojej klinice, firmie,: If a science and technology problem arises in your clinic, company, start-up or during the implementation of a grant, you want to validate an idea, solve nagging questions or modernize an existing solution - we are here to do it.
pl:en-US:Działamy efektywnie bez zbędnej: We operate efficiently without unnecessary bureaucracy
pl:en-US:Nie mamy sztywnych ram ani ogra: We have no rigid framework or limitations
pl:en-US:Wspieramy projekty na każdym et: We support projects at every stage
pl:en-US:Łączymy różne dziedziny nauki i: We combine different fields of science and practice
pl:en-US:Poznaj dorobek naukowy zespołu: Learn about the team's scientific achievements
pl:en-US:Masz pomysł badawczy?: Do you have a research idea?
pl:en-US:Niezależnie od etapu projektu –: Regardless of the stage of the project - from conception to analysis of the results - we can help with its execution, implementation and publication.
pl:en-US:Pracownia Unikalnych Modeli Apl: Studio of Unique Application Models. All rights reserved.
pl:en-US:Naukowcy, doktoranci i studenci: Researchers, doctoral students and undergraduates who make up P.U.M.A.
pl:en-US:Nasz zespół to grupa pasjonatów: Our team is a group of science enthusiasts who combine academic experience with a practical approach to research. Together we create innovative solutions in the fields of microbiology, biotechnology and medicine.
pl:en-US:Granty i współprace realizowane: Grants and collaborations implemented by the P.U.M.A. team.
pl:en-US:Dorobek naukowy zespołu P.U.M.A: Scientific achievements of the P.U.M.A. team.
pl:en-US:Innowacyjne systemy i organizmy: Innovative systems and model organisms used at P.U.M.A.
pl:en-US:Dołącz do zespołu P.U.M.A. - et: Join the P.U.M.A. team. - FTEs, internships and PhDs
pl:en-US:Praca z doświadczonymi naukowca: Work with experienced scientists and enthusiasts
pl:en-US:Dostęp do nowoczesnych laborato: Access to modern laboratories and technology
pl:en-US:Praca na Uniwersytecie Medyczny: Working at the Medical University of Wroclaw
pl:en-US:Oferujemy różne formy współprac: We offer various forms of cooperation - from full-time positions, to internships, to PhDs. Choose the option you are interested in for details.
pl:en-US:Chcesz pracować w miejscu, gdzi: Do you want to work in a place where science meets technology and results really mean something? At P.U.M.A., there is no room for stagnation. We need people who think outside the box, act fast and are not afraid of responsibility. If research is your passion - we will find you a place on board.
pl:en-US:Masz pomysł, który inni uznalib: Have an idea that others would consider too difficult or too daring? You're welcome. At P.U.M.A., we don't run away from challenges - we turn them into projects, data, patents and publications that you can participate in. If you want to do more than just collect points for your resume, you'll find partners here who will not only listen to you and help get you moving, but also support you in both your day-to-day scientific inquiries and your struggles with bureaucracy.
pl:en-US:Doktorat to coś więcej niż tytu: A PhD is more than a title - it's a chance to get off the beaten track and explore something that really fascinates you and the world doesn't yet know it needs. At P.U.M.A., we understand that every science project is a journey - sometimes you don't know where you'll leave, but that's why it's worth starting. We're here to help you turn your curiosity into PhD chapters, your results into publications, and your experiments into something you'll be proud to talk about later.
pl:en-US:Wypełnij formularz aplikacyjny: Fill out the application form and join the P.U.M.A. team.
pl:en-US:Nawiąż współpracę naukową i bad: Establish scientific and research cooperation with P.U.M.A.
pl:en-US:Doświadczony zespół naukowców z: Experienced team of scientists from various fields
pl:en-US:Dostęp do specjalistycznych lab: Access to specialized laboratories and equipment
pl:en-US:Badania mikrobiologiczne z wyko: Microbiological studies using in vivo and in vitro models
pl:en-US:Dopasowanie do potrzeb i budżet: Tailor to project needs and budget
pl:en-US:Od pomysłu przez badania po wdr: From idea to research to implementation
pl:en-US:Naszym celem jest łączenie nauk: Our goal is to connect science with practice. We support both individual researchers and institutions that want to innovate in the fields of medicine, biotechnology and life sciences. If you have an idea for a research project or need support in implementing the experimental part - we invite you to contact us.
pl:en-US:Prowadzimy współpracę z uczelni: We work with universities, startups, research centers and companies in the pharmaceutical and biotechnology sectors. Regardless of the stage of your idea - from conception to analysis of results - we can help with its implementation and publication.
pl:en-US:Realizacja części eksperymental: Implementation of the experimental part of the projects
pl:en-US:Masz pytania lub chcesz omówić: Do you have questions or want to discuss cooperation opportunities? Fill out the form and we will get in touch with you.
pl:en-US:Wydział Farmaceutyczny Uniwersy: Faculty of Pharmacy, University of Medical Sciences
pl:en-US:im. Piastów Śląskich we Wrocław: im. Piasts of Silesia in Wroclaw
